; PATH=/etc/bind/zones/db.Default
;
; DNS Zone file for prismproof.org using DNS setup Default
;
; This file is automatically generated CHANGES WILL BE OVERWRITTEN
;
$TTL 600
prismproof.org.      IN      SOA     dns1.prismproof.org. hallam.gmail.com. (
                        2018010601       ; serial, todays date + todays serial 
                        3600              ; refresh, seconds
                        1800              ; retry, seconds
                        3600000              ; expire, seconds
                        600 )            ; minimum, seconds

; Additional name servers
prismproof.org.     IN      NS      dns1.prismproof.org.
dns1.prismproof.org.    A 178.62.79.124 
prismproof.org.     IN      NS      dns2.prismproof.org.
dns2.prismproof.org.    A 139.59.200.120 


prismproof.org.    IN     CAA 0 issue "comodoca.com"
prismproof.org.    IN     CAA 0 issue "letsencrypt.org"
prismproof.org.    IN     CAA 0 issuewild  ";"
prismproof.org.    IN     CAA 0 iodef "mailto:hostmaster@hallambaker.com"

; Hardcoded A records

; For now, forward all mail to a forwarder on the authopritative
prismproof.org.       IN      MX       1 smtp1.hallambaker.com.

; Web redirect to www.mathmesh.com (is in host directory prismproof/)

; Host host1.mathmesh.com 108.7.198.158
prismproof.org.    A 108.7.198.158 
www.prismproof.org.    A 108.7.198.158 
http.prismproof.org.    A 108.7.198.158
https.prismproof.org.    A 108.7.198.158 
_http._tcp.prismproof.org.  IN    SRV 1 1 80 host1.mathmesh.com.
_https._tcp.prismproof.org.   IN   SRV 1 1 443 host1.mathmesh.com.
